authorization.configuration_explanation:
Add your Kodi connection details to connect!
These can be found under System > System info.
In Settings / Services activate 'Allow programs on other systems to control Kodi'
Don't forget to reboot Kodi after this option has been enabled. Make sure your HTTP port is not configured to be 9090!
